definition: to hold a governmental office or post/to assume office of/to take charge of/to serve as
to undertake/to carry/to shoulder/to take responsibility
picul (100 catties, 50 kg)/two buckets full/carrying pole and its load/classifier for loads carried on a shoulder pole
surname Ren/Ren County 任縣|任县[Ren2 Xian4] in Hebei

to assign/to appoint/to take up a post/office/responsibility/to let/to allow/to give free rein to/no matter (how, what etc)/classifier for terms served in office, or for spouses, girlfriends etc (as in 前任男友)

sentences.english: Dr Kraabel began as an editor with the Edanz Group in 2008.
sentences.chinese: 2008年开始为理文编辑工作，担任编辑。

sentences.english: Anna Hu joined in as Group Business Director and other hires.
sentences.chinese: 胡晓云加入担任业务群总监，还有一些新成员加盟。

sentences.english: This is my third visit in just over two years as Secretary-General of the United Nations.
sentences.chinese: 这是我担任联合国秘书长两年多来的第三次访问。

sentences.english: Her delicate constitution disinclined her from such an arduous job.
sentences.chinese: 她纤弱的体质使得她不欲担任如此艰钜的工作。

sentences.english: He became provost in 2006 and president the following year.
sentences.chinese: 他从2006年起担任教务长并于次年成为校长。

sentences.english: Have worked in large companies the technical backbone of the more appropriate.
sentences.chinese: 有在大公司担任过技术骨干的比较合适。

sentences.english: The Church instituted the young man into a benefice.
sentences.chinese: 教会任命这个年轻人担任牧师一职。

sentences.english: I work as a network and systems administrator for a mid-sized company.
sentences.chinese: 我就职于一家中型企业担任网络和系统管理员工作。

sentences.english: Yoda, acting as general, oversaw the battle from the forward command center.
sentences.chinese: 尤达担任统帅，在前线指挥中心督战。

sentences.english: In the past two years, I have been an editor for the English Paper of my department.
sentences.chinese: 在过去的两年里我一直担任本系英语报的一名编辑。

sentences.english: Qomolangma started with Gyigyi as the first bearer and Wang Yongfeng the second.
sentences.chinese: 此后，王勇峰队长担任第二棒火炬手。

sentences.english: Therefore actively served as high school three years.
sentences.chinese: 因此高中三年积极担任学艺。

sentences.english: I was a member of the university singing club for two years.
sentences.chinese: 我曾两年担任学校合唱团的团员。

sentences.english: The President designated him for premiership.
Xiao Zhimei served as the general manager of the high champion supermarket, wasteful spending.
sentences.chinese: 萧芝媚担任高尔佳超市的总经理后，大手大脚花钱。
